Text.Language: Nai e~tafhotpou eucop: n~je Pip~neuma eyouab: m~v~r/] n~oukuyara: euc~mou e~V] n~c/ou niben.
Those whom the Holy Spirit, has attuned together, as a stringed instrument, always blessing God.

Qen han'almoc nem hanhwc: nem hanhwd/ m~p~neumatikon: m~pie~hoou nem pie~jwrh: qen ouh/t n~at,arwf.
By psalms and hymns, and spiritual songs, by day and by night, with an incessant heart.
